heuristic_function.description: Two domain heuristics (Heuristics.java and SushiGoHeuristic.java) combined via BlendedHeuristic (alpha=0.5) inside MyAgent.java
heuristic_function.formula: score = immediate + combos + pudding + chopsticks + blocking - risk
heuristic_function.weights_note: Weights live in each heuristic class; blend weight alpha in MyAgent.java

mcts_parameters.note: Set in makeParams() in MyAgent.java (no fixed line numbers)
